Write a concise changelog for this Flutter plugin release.
- Output must start with `### <VERSION>` on the first line (replace with the provided version).
- Use short bullet points summarizing user-visible changes derived from the commit list.
- Group or reorder items if it improves clarity, but stay brief.
- Highlight behavior changes, new features, fixes, and notable chores; omit noise.
- Keep formatting in Markdown.
